name: Smart Email Responder Workflow using AI
description:
This project presents an intelligent email management system powered by advanced artificial intelligence. It utilizes Google's Gemini 2.0 AI model to automatically categorize incoming emails into queries, project updates, and feedback, and generates context-specific responses in real time.

Approach:
The system processes emails promptly, ensuring consistent and timely communication. In addition to crafting automated replies, it streamlines workflow efficiency by sending calendar invitations for meetings without manual intervention.

Results:
The Smart Email Auto-Responder enhances email management by marking emails as read, applying appropriate labels, and systematically logging correspondence. This significantly reduces manual workload while improving client engagement and operational productivity.

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.

data.details: The Code node allows you to execute JavaScript in your workflow.

categories.description: Use this category when the email is asking for information about our company, products, processes, pricing, timelines, legal terms or any other general inquiry that expects a factual explanation or guidance.

Choose this category when the sender is notifying us about progress or changes: signing the agreement, submitting or revising scripts, updating requirements, sharing evaluation results, or any status report that moves an ongoing project forward
Select this category when the email contains compliments, complaints, suggestions, or any qualitative feedback about our service, product, communication or overall experience

Project Update Acknowledgement

Hi {{ $json.from.value[0].name || $('Gmail Trigger').item.json.headers.from.split('<')[0].trim() || 'there' }},

Thank you for your recent update on the project. We‚Äôve reviewed the information you provided and have logged it in our system.

What we received:

  • Signed agreement / contract confirmation.
  • Revised requirements or scope changes.
  • Draft scripts or other deliverables for review.
  • Evaluation results or performance reports.

Next steps:

  • Our team will review the materials and integrate any changes within 2‚Äì3 business days.
  • If clarifications are needed, we‚Äôll reach out via email or schedule a quick call.
  • You‚Äôll receive the updated project timeline once the review is complete.

If you have additional files or questions, feel free to reply directly to this email.

We appreciate your prompt communication and look forward to moving the project ahead smoothly.

Best regards,
Sophia Mitchell
